Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class InputSlot<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.Slot<T>
      • org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.InputSlot<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - see Slot
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class InputSlot<T>
extends Slot<T>
implements java.io.Serializable
    An input slot declares an input of an Operator.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
